heroDescription: I build meaningful digital products that solve real‑world problems using modern web technologies, with a focus on scalability and user‑friendliness.
aboutParagraph1: I'm a full-stack developer focused on building fast, scalable web products with modern technologies. I specialize in the PERN stack (PostgreSQL, Express, React, Node.js) and Next.js for end-to-end application development.
aboutParagraph2: I work primarily with TypeScript, Supabase, and Tailwind CSS to ship reliable backends and clean, responsive interfaces. I also use Python for data processing, automation, and tooling when it adds leverage.
aboutParagraph3: My approach emphasizes performance, clarity, and maintainability—building systems that scale cleanly and deliver strong user experiences.
project1.title: Portfolio
project1.description: A sleek, minimal and modern web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Designed to showcase my skills in frontend architecture, responsive design, and performance optimization through clean, scalable code.
project2.title: E-commerce
project2.description: A modern, full-stack e-commerce marketplace primarily built with React, Express.js, and Bootstrap. It supports multi-role access (admin, seller, customer) and offers complete functionality designed to compete with platforms like Amazon.
project3.title: BOS
project3.description: Brain Operating System - A comprehensive productivity suite that helps you become the best version of yourself. BOS combines powerful productivity tools with built-in social features, creating an ecosystem where you can organize your goals, track habits, manage tasks, and connect with like-minded individuals. It's not just an app, but a complete system designed to optimize your personal growth and productivity journey.
